name: Time Pound
description:
Why Run, when you can Roll & Pound?

Amelia Watson time travelled too much and now she's stuck in a time loop!

Help her escape building up Time by dodging and pounding whatever is in her way!

What's the hightest Time and Combo you can get?

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: Move Left/Right
  • Space Bar: Jump (press again in the air to Ground Pound)
Credits
  • Programming, Background/Obstacles Art: Icefox
  • Amelia Sprites: Walfie
  • Music: YouFulca
  • Font: Soulty Ragevin
  • Watson Amelia
